alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:22AM CDT until April 01 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central McNairy County in west Tennessee... Central Hardin County in west Tennessee... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1222 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Savannah, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, Adamsville, Olive Hill, Shiloh, Crump, Michie, Stantonville, Lowryville, Mount Vinson, Hamburg, Phillips, Tulu, Pittsburg Landing, Childers Hill, Center Star, West Shihloh, Maddox, Hurley, Walkertown and Bucktown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
